events.title: Winter Turkey Shoot Classic
events.description: Join us for our annual Winter Turkey Shoot. Traditional turkey shoot competition with 50 targets and Lewis Class scoring. Entry includes lunch and a chance at door prizes. Frozen turkeys for class winners! Best score takes home the bird.

events.title: Members-Only Poker Shoot
events.description: Our famous poker shoot is back! Five stands, five cards. Best poker hand wins the pot. $20 buy-in, re-buys allowed. Shoot five stations, draw a card at each. High hand takes 60% of the pot, second place 30%, third 10%.

events.title: New Year Sporting Clays
events.description: Kick off the new year with our challenging sporting clays course. Start 2026 right with 100 targets across 15 stations. Hot coffee and donuts provided. Squads start every 30 minutes.

events.title: Introduction to Trap Clinic
events.description: Perfect for beginners! New to trap shooting? Learn the basics from certified instructors. Learn safety, etiquette, and technique. Includes gun rental, ammunition, and one-on-one instruction. Limited to 25 participants.
